articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Samjiyon County
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the work in various fields of Samjiyon County.
					 He first looked round the statue of President Kim Il Sung on the shore of Lake Samji and the Samjiyon Grand Monument and other places to learn in detail about the management of battle sites and how education is conducted through them.
					
					 The area of Samjiyon is a holy place of revolution where sites associated with revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle are concentrated and an important centre for the education in the revolutionary traditions, he said, adding that to spruce those battle sites up well is part of the sacred work for firmly preserving and carrying forward and developing the revolutionary traditions, the treasure of eternal value for the revolution.
					
					 It is the fixed will and resolution of our Party to eternally preserve, carry forward and develop the revolutionary traditions established by the President in the period of the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and accomplish the Juche cause of revolution on the basis of these great traditions, he noted, stressing that the glorious revolutionary traditions of our Party serve as a main source of the great mental power of the indomitable people of the DPRK.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks that would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the battle sites and further intensifying the education through them.
					
					 He then provided field guidance to the newly built Samjiyon Soy and Bean Paste Factory.
					
					 The factory built at the foot of the Pegae Hill in peculiar style is another present made by Kim Jong Il with loving care to the population of the county and the participants in the study tour as he is always considerate of providing people with larger quantities of tasty and nutritive foodstuffs.
					
					 After being briefed before a huge map showing a panoramic view of the factory, he went round the room devoted to the history of the factory and various production processes to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and technological equipment and production there.
					
					 Watching the work sites which have a high level of hygienic and cultural environment and varieties of quality essential foodstuffs such as soy bean paste, soy sauce and table oil churning out in an endless stream from each machine, he expressed great satisfaction with the construction of a modern factory for people.
					
					 The factory located in a good place is a profitable one as it produces tasty and nutritive foodstuffs with a small area for production and manpower by dint of cutting-edge science and technology, he said, highly praising the builders for having done good for people.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the factory for its management and operation. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Hi Thaek, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Potato Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Potato Farm
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to a large potato farm now under construction in the area of Tokpho in Paekam County.
					 After being briefed before a huge map showing the long-term plan for potato production in the county, he looked round the farm under construction to learn about the progress made in the project. 
					
					 The potato farm is of weighty importance in turning Paekam County into a centre for potato production, he noted, setting forth important tasks for building the farm. 
					
					 Noting that eye-opening changes have taken place in the potato farming in various mountainous areas including Taehongdan County in recent years, he said that such stirring reality clearly proves the validity and great vitality of the Party's policy for bringing about a radical turn in potato farming.
					
					 What is the most important for the construction of the potato farm is to give priority to building roads under a long-term plan, he said. 
					
					 Saying that the experience gained by Taehongdan County proves that it is necessary to successfully create shelterbelts to reap a rich and stable harvest, he underlined the need to plant many tall trees by the sides of fields to protect them from the wind in highlands. 
					
					 Underlining the need to mechanize all farm operations from sowing to weeding, manuring and harvesting, he called for supplying sufficient number of machines and other means necessary for them. 
					
					 He said in order to steadily increase the potato yield it is necessary to thoroughly implement the Party's policy for bringing about a radical turn in seed improvement and, at the same time, boost the soil fertility by developing stockbreeding in a big way and establish an irrigation system. 
					
					 Underscoring the need to take thorough measures for storing and processing potatoes in keeping with the sharp increase in the potato production so as to make an effective use of the harvested potatoes, he urged the county to take measures to have in place facilities for storing and processing potatoes in advance. 
					
					 As the large farm is now under construction, the county is faced with Herculean tasks to build dwelling houses, schools, kindergartens, hospitals and many other structures, he noted, adding that in order to successfully carry them out, officials and other working people should pool efforts and push forward all work in a bold and big way through a blitz and by a finish-one-by-one method. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the people in the county would turn out as one in the drive for changing the land of Paekam into the nation's leading potato producer as early as possible and thus take the lead in the socialist rural construction and the agricultural production.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Hi Thaek, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to to Libyan Leader
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to to Libyan Leader
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People’s Assembly, on May 13 sent a message of condolences to Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Revolution of the Great Socialist People’s Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, as regards the recent crash of a Libyan airliner that claimed big casualties. 
					Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the leader and, through him, to the victims and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Norwegian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Norwegian King
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Harald V, king of Norway, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the Norwegian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: IUCN Delegation Here
articles.content:
IUCN  Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Asia Regional Office of the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) headed by Director Aban Marker Kabraji arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kwangju Uprising
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kwangju Uprising
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang meeting was held at the Central Hall of Workers on Monday to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising of south Korean people.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, Ryu Mi Yong, chairperson of the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party, Jo Chung Han, presidium member of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, An Kyong Ho, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, leading officials of public organizations, presidents and rectors of universities and officials of power organs, working people, youth and students in the city of Pyongyang. 
					
					 The Kwangju Popular Uprising was a just anti-U.S. and anti-fascist democratic resistance waged by the south Korean people to achieve the independence and democracy of society and the country's reunification against the colonial fascist rule of the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys. And it was a popular armed uprising in which all the citizens of Kwangju rose against the U.S. imperialists and the puppet military fascist clique, braving death.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his report that the uprising ended in a failure due to the U.S. imperialists and the puppet military fascist clique's barbarous bloody suppression, but it shook the colonial fascist rule of south Korea to its very foundation, fully demonstrated the indomitable will and heroic stamina of the south Korean people to achieve the independence and democracy of society and the country's reunification and powerfully encouraged the oppressed people in colonies to the struggle for national liberation. 
					
					 The uprising taught the south Korean people a bitter lesson that the U.S. imperialists are the heinous aggressors and murderers who do not hesitate to commit horrible genocide when they deem it necessary for achieving their purpose of domination and meeting their interests and that they can never realize any desire unless the military presence and colonial domination of the U.S. imperialists are brought to an end, the reporter noted.
					
					  Saying that this year is a significant year marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, he called upon all the compatriots in the north and the south and abroad to courageously frustrate all obstructions of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad under the banner of the joint declaration and vigorously accelerate the nation-wide grand march for reunification.

articles.title: Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the 13th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition Monday.
					 On display are products from companies and organizations of the DPRK, China, Germany, Russia, Mongolia, Switzerland, Singapore, Australia, Austria, Italy, Indonesia, Cuba, Poland and Taipei of China. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were O Su Yong, vice-premier of the DPRK, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, officials in the field of foreign trade, delegations of different countries and regions and representatives and staff members of foreign embassies here. 
					
					 Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, made a congratulatory speech to be followed by an inaugural speech by Kim Mun Jong, president of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation. 
					
					 Speakers hoped that all the participants would achieve successes through multi-faceted economic and technological exchange and brisk trade during the fair.
					
					 They declared the DPRK would in the future, too, further expand and develop economic cooperation with all countries friendly towards it on the principle of equality and mutual benefit.
					
					 A reception was given at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on the same day in connection with the opening of the fair.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The 36th National School Youth and Children's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Monday.
					 The contest brought together at least 5,000 school youth and children selected in provinces. The participants will compete in 17 events including football, basketball and volleyball, divided into the group of secondary schools and the group of primary schools.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said in his opening speech that the contest, being held this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the WPK, would contribute to preparing school youth and children to be reliable pillars for building of a great prosperous and powerful nation, equipped with ample knowledge, high morality and strong physique, and training more talented reserve players by developing the school sporting.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Middle School Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Middle School Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting friendship delegation of the Jilin Yuwen Middle School of China.
					 He Manli, principal of the school who is heading the delegation, handed over the gift to an official concerned.

articles.title: DPRK Prove Successful in FIG World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Prove Successful in FIG World Cup
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Players of the DPRK proved successful in the FIG World Cup Competition held in Moscow.
					 The tournament brought together at least 100 ace male and female gymnasts from 28 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, Germany, Sweden and Brazil. 
					
					 Hong Un Jong and Kim Jin Hyok won gold medals in women's long horse vault and men's parallel bars respectively.
					
					Cha Yong Hwa and Kim Un Hyang respectively came second in women's asymmetric bars and women's balance beam. Meanwhile, Ri Se Gwang placed third in men's long horse vault.

articles.title: Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Goes On in China
articles.content:
Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Goes On in China
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK on a visit to China gave premiere of opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region on May 14.
					 The Huhehaote State Grand Theatre, the venue of the opera performance, was packed to overflowing with a great number of audiences. 
					
					 Among the audience were party and government officials from the capital city and the autonomous region and cadres of the army. 
					
					 The audience was in passion and excitement from beginning to end, filled with the ardent Korea-China friendship.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain"
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain"
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" has been performed before full houses in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The light comedy is based on devoted and worthwhile efforts of peasants in a mountainous area to increase the grain production and turn their village into a place good to live in.
					
					 The work, which was originally created by the creators and artistes of the then Kangwon Provincial Art Theatre in Juche 50 (1961), has been recreated by the State Theatrical Troupe some time ago to meet the demand of the new era.
					
					 It is set against the background of the period of socialist construction in the 1960s but reflects important issues relating to state policies and the Korean people's efforts and life in the present period of a great upsurge.
					
					 It teaches the people a true way for happiness and prosperity.
					
					 It calls on the people to pursue continued innovations, not contended with what they have done, and ride Chollima (a legendary horse running 250 miles a day), not a donkey, reminding them of an appeal of the Workers' Party of Korea to plant their feet on their land with an eye on the world. 
					
					 The light comedy encourages the people to turn out in making a fresh upsurge in their work.
					
					Some time ago, General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated the light comedy again and praised it as a masterpiece giving a profound truth of life.

articles.title: Korean Socialism Based on Single-Hearted Unity
articles.content:
Korean Socialism Based on Single-Hearted Unity
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public a famous work, "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish", in May Juche 80 (1991).
					 The work gives a full explanation of the key to the stable and invincible features of Korean socialist society guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 It is stressed in the work that Korean socialist society is the best one chosen and built by the Korean people themselves to suit the actual conditions of the country and is an invincible one based on the single-minded unity of the leader, the Party and the masses.
					
					 Over the nearly two decades since the publication of the work the Korean people have fully displayed the scientific validity and great vitality of socialism centred on the masses and guided by the great Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 They are steadily bolstering up the national power in every way with a main stress put on military capabilities.
					
					 In the wake of the start of the Juche iron and fiber production, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex has completed a large-scaled anthracite gasification project to mass-produce fertilizers and many other achievements of great significance in improving the people's living standard have been made in the country thanks to the single-hearted unity of all the people, including the servicepersons, who share the same ideology and intention with their leader.

articles.title: Police's Interfere in "Elections" Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Police's Interfere in "Elections" Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on May 11 issued a statement titled "Let's judge the dictatorial regime for using police for its operation to stage government power-dominated elections".
					 The statement referred to the recently disclosed fact that the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency worked out and distributed a document dealing with the "strategy of the left-wing forces" for the election of the "Seoul education inspector", "plans of support by the Teachers Union, the Confederation of Trade Unions and others" and the strategy for ensuring the ruling forces' victory in the "elections".
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency openly revealed his intention not to stop the police from interfering in the "elections", far from reflecting on their crimes, the statement deplored. 
					
					 It accused the "Election Management Committee" of patronizing the police, claiming that it is the "duty peculiar to the police", an issue which does not allow the committee to meddle in. 
					
					 The statement blasted the committee for shifting the responsibility for investigation into it on to the prosecution and the prosecution for shunning the investigation. It called upon all the people to frustrate the moves of the security forces to interfere in the "elections" and mete out a stern judgment to them.
					
					 All the people should inflict a crushing defeat on the conservative ruling forces through the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" in particular, the statement urged.

articles.title: Suppression of Progressive Forces Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Progressive Forces Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different circles in south Korea, including the Solidarity for Voters in 2010 made up of more than 2,000 civic and public organizations and opposition parties, called a press conference in Seoul on May 14 at which they denounced the puppet group for intensifying the suppression of progressive forces with the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" at hand.
					 The organizations chided the "Election Management Committee" for labeling the activities of civic and public organizations against the unpopular rule of the authorities, as evidenced by their projects for the "improvement of the four large rivers," "illegal ones".
					
					 They accused the "committee" of feigning ignorance of the "government's" irregularities and swindles, stating that they would not tolerate the unreasonable application of double-standards to the issues related to the "elections".

articles.title: Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Urged
articles.content:
Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Urged
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on May 12 in denunciation of the rhetoric let loose by the puppet group of traitors.
					 The statement recalled that on May 11 the present chief executive, referring to the candle-light actions against the import of American beef, blustered that "there would be no social development without people's repentance" and urged them to "reflect" on those actions.  
					
					 Two years ago, he said he admitted the fact that the unilateral "administration of state affairs" caused antipathy among people, the statement noted, adding that all the people can hardly repress their resentment at what he behaved at present diametrically contrary to his earlier statement. 
					
					 This proves that the present chief executive just pretended to admit his failure in "state administration" in a bid to get rid of the crisis caused by the candle-light actions and waited for a chance for retaliation, laughing at the people, the statement pointed out.
					
					  It demanded that the chief executive step down as early as possible as he is characterized by lies and arrogance.

articles.title: Korean Exhibition Held in Peru
articles.content:
Korean Exhibition Held in Peru
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was held in Tayacaja City, Huancavelica Province of Peru, from April 27 to May 10 to mark the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" and the 13th anniversary of his another work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
					 On display in the venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their immortal feats, books introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The mayor of Tayacaja, addressing its opening ceremony, said that it is their honor to hold such an excellent exhibition one year since the city registered the three commanders of Mt. Paektu of Korea as its honorary citizens and on the publication anniversaries of Kim Jong Il's works.
					
					 Expressing belief that the exhibition will contribute to further deepening the ties of friendship between the peoples of the two countries, between the citizens of Tayacaja City and the Korean people in particular, he sincerely hoped that more significant events such as the current exhibition would be held.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la obra de central hidroelectrica juventud Songun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la obra de central hidroelectrica juventud Songun
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo la visita de orientacion sobre el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Songun de Paektusan.
					 Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la central, el Dirigente averiguo en detalles como marcha la obra recorriendo el campo de construccion.
					
					 Se mostro muy complacido de la edificacion de otro patrimonio nacional de eterna duracion diciendo que la central esta situada en el lugar adecuado y fue disenada bien observando estrictamente el principio de rentabilidad.
					
					Al contemplar el dique y los talleres de trabajo, evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores jovenes poniendose muy contento de que ellos hayan cumplido en un corto tiempo la gran parte de la obra empleando el heroismo masivo y la abnegacion patriotica y agradecio a todos los constructores que derraman el sudor de fidelidad por la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					 Pese al duro clima de esta zona donde perdura un tremendo frio que oscila entre 30 y 40 grados bajo cero y a otras condiciones desfavorables de trabajo, los constructores jovenes de la nueva generacion, que siempre viven y luchan con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, crearon la magnifica proeza, de que admira todo el mundo, trabajando con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de autoconfianza para cumplir su decision de terminar esta gigantesca obra con sus propias fuerzas, dijo y volvio a valorar altamente la ardiente fidelidad y el noble patriotismo de ellos.
					
					Los miembros de la Brigada Juvenil Songun de Paektusan construyeron por cuenta propia a lo largo del pais numerosas creaciones excelentes, dignas de legar a las generaciones venideras, superando con gran audacia todas las pruebas como destacamento vanguardia de la gran causa por construir una gran potencia prospera, apunto.
					
					Prosiguio que este gran exito de mucho valor deviene la excelente muestra del gran poderio espiritual que pueden tener solo los jovenes coreanos educados y formados en el regazo del partido.
					
					Se cercioro de los innumerables actos loables de los jovenes surgidos en el curso de construccion viendo la coleccion de obras literarias y artisticas creadas por los miembros de la brigada.
					
					En todas las creaciones monumentales que sirven de bienes eternos de la patria, estan impregnados la  sangre y sudor preciosos de los jovenes de la epoca del Songun, subrayo y anadio que la sagrada causa revolucionaria de Corea iniciada por los martires continua firmemente gracias al gran ejercito de los jovenes, que resulta el mas dinamico y cumple el papel protagonico en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en terminar con anticipacion la obra.
					
					Senalo que los constructores valientes deben construir de manera cualitativa la central como creacion eterna dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion de la juventud para cumplir con su sagrado deber asumido ante la revolucion y la epoca. 
					
					El Dirigente expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores jovenes manifestaran mas el impetu heroico de los jovenes de la Corea del Songun terminando cuanto antes con su incomparable abnegacion la construccion de la citada central.
					
					En esta ocasion el fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Ryanggang, Kim Hi Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion militar de la RPDC advierte a la parte Sur
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion militar de la RPDC advierte a la parte Sur
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los titeres surcoreanos lanzan demencialmente la campana psicologica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el fin de llevar las relaciones intercoreanas a la confrontacion y al choque, el Ejercito Popular de Corea ya ha advertido con seriedad el pasado 10 de abril que tomaria pronto contramedidas decisivas si ellos no adoptan las medidas para el cese de la campana y no las avisan oficialmente.
					Sin embargo, las autoridades del ejercito titere surcoreano intentaron hacer de las suyas con mandar un simple aviso de respuesta que no paso de ser un pretexto para eludir su responsabilidad de la campana psicologica anti-RPDC que persigue malsanos objetivos.
					
					Debido a tal actitud irresponsable de las autoridades militares surcoreanas, esa campana se torna cada vez mas brutal. 
					
					Con respecto a ello, el jefe de la delegacion de la parte Norte a las conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur envio el dia 16 a las autoridades militares surcoreanas el siguiente aviso:
					
					A pesar de las reiteradas exigencias de nuestra parte sobre el cese de la campana psicologica anti-RPDC, la parte Sur volvio a instigar y dar su tacito beneplacito a la chusma para que esta esparciera a partir del primero de mayo un gran cantidad de volantes de malsano contenido que calumnian la ideologia y el sistema de la RPDC, radios de bolsillo, billetes de un dolar norteamericano y DVD. 
					
					 Si la parte Sur actua de continuo con imprudencia violando flagrantemente los acuerdos bilaterales, nuestro ejercito tomara, como ya habia advertido, las medidas practicas mas severas que limitar y bloquear el transito terrestre del personal surcoreano por el area administrada por ambas partes en las zonas costeras del Mar Este y el Oeste de Corea.
					
					 La parte Sur ha de tener presente que debera responsabilizarse totalmente por la consecuencia catastrofica que emane del reinicio de la campana psicologica contra la RPDC. 
					
					 La evolucion de la situacion estara sujeta a la observacion del acuerdo Norte-Sur por la parte surcoreana. 
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos deben examinar con seriedad la advertencia del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencias a Moammer el Gaddafi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencias a Moammer el Gaddafi
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 13 un telegrama de condolencias al dirigente de la Gran Revolucion de La Gran Jamahiria Arabe Libia Popular Socialista, Moammer el Gaddafi, en relacion con que recientemente ocurrio la gran perdida humana a consecuencia de un accidente de la caida de un avion libio.
					El remitente expresa al destinatario y por su conducto, a las victimas y sus familiares profunda simpatia y condolencias.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de UICN
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de UICN
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ATCC) -- Llego el dia 17 a esta capital por via aerea La delegacion de la Oficina Regional de Asia de la Union Internacional para la Conservacion de Naturaleza (UICN) presidida por su director, Aban Marker Kabraji.
